ARABIC: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلٌ ٱفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا وَمَا نَحْنُ لَهُۥ بِمُؤْمِنِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: What is he but a man who has invented a lie against Allah? We do not have iman in him.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He is just a man who invents a lie about God; we cannot believe in him."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: This man has forged a mere lie in the name of Allah and we shall never believe what he says."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He is only a man who invents lies against God, so have no faith in him".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “He is just a man who has fabricated a lie against Allah, and we are not going to believe him.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He is only a man who has invented a lie against Allah, and we are not going to believe in him."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He is naught but a man who has forged a lie against Allah, and we are not going to believe in him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He is naught but a man who has forged against God a lie, and we will not believe him.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He is only a man who hath invented a lie about Allah. We are not going to put faith in him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He is only a man who has invented a lie about God, and we are not going to believe him!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He is but a man who hath fabricated against God a lie, and in him we are not going to be believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He is just a man who has fabricated a lie against Allah, and we will not believe in him.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He is only a man who invents a lie against Allah, but we are not the ones to believe in him!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He is only a man who has invented a lie against Allah, but we are not going to believe in him."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He is nothing but a man who has forged against Allah a lie, we will never believe him'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He is nothing but a man, making up lies about God. We have no faith in him.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He is not but a man who has invented a lie about Allah, and we will not believe him."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:38] He is, the Messenger is, just a man who has invented a lie against God, and we will not believe in him’, we will [not] accept the truth of resurrection after death.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He is only a man) they mean the Messenger is only a man (who hath invented a lie about Allah) in that which he says. (We are not going to put faith in him) we are not going to believe what he says.
